text: @Yamiche @mtysonbro How on Earth could ANYone, even a dimwit like @POTUS #TRUMP,  EVER imagine that a rapidly-expanding, deadly, novel #coronavirus pandemic “could be maybe good”? He’s desperate for everyone to forget that just over a month ago he predicted 0 cases within days, & called it a HOAX.
